oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Christmas at the Ryman (2012)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Christmas; Gill, Vince; Grant, Amy; holidays; Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (green and red on brown) announcing Amy Grant and Vince Gill's Christmas at the Ryman at the Ryman Auditorium on December 18 to 20. Poster features a metal photoplate of Santa Claus and woodcuts of holly leaves.
